text: @realDonaldTrump The Central Park Five WERE innocent, Barack Obama WAS born in the US, Mexico did NOT pay for the wall, Hillary Clinton is NOT locked up, There was NEVER murderous caravans coming from South America, the Coronavirus in NOT a hoax, and finally, mail in voting is NOT corrupt!
